hopobject.body:
Hardware Support

Solve your hardware woes here with assists from reference manuals, schematics and other device-specific documentation. Subscribe to the mailing lists for updates or get your questions answered live on the IRC Channel.

System Technical Reference Manuals

  • BeagleBone Black System Technical Reference Manual

  • BeagleBone System Technical Reference Manual

  • BeagleBoard-xM System Technical Reference Manual

  • BeagleBoard System Technical Reference Manual

Interactive Support

Discussion Groups

Collaborate on the Beagle community forum Click Here

IRC Group Chat

Live chat with other open source enthusiasts
Click Here »

Device-Level Hardware Documentation


BeagleBone Black

Hardware Files
Access the next-generation Beagle's latest production files here.

Click Here

BeagleBone

Hardware Files
Click to find hardware files for all revisions of the BeagleBone.

Click Here

BeagleBoard-xM

Hardware Files
Explore the hardware information for all revisions of the BeagleBoard-xM.

Click Here

BeagleBoard

Hardware Files
Find all of the original Beagle's hardware information, for every revision.

Click Here

Capes & Accessories

Explore the world of feature-rich capes and other accessories for super-charged functionality. Plug in and go! Visit the cape store to see all options.

Repairs

  • Complete the RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) Form whichSubmission of an RMA form alerts the manufacturer to your issue and serves as
  • Step 3 – Mail Your Board

Additional Materials

  • eLinux Wiki for Beagle Beginners
  • eLinux Wiki for Beaglebone
  • eLinux Wiki for Beagleboard

  • AM3359 ARM Cortex-A8 Info
  • AM3358 ARM Cortex-A8 Info
  • DM3730 ARM Cortex-A8 Info
